::KitKat:;

Still running, opens link,"That's not what I said. I said I don't 
want you getting hurt unless it's in a battle.  You and the rest of 
hte group were not to fight unless I or Megatron specificvaly said to 
go and fight. And I didn't say that. NOW RETURN TO BASE AT ONCE!"
